message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. Considering its worth to both parties, I am offering it to you at a special price of $1350000. This offer is designed to ensure mutual benefit while respecting the perceived value of the product to you at $1200000. I look forward to hearing your response. Kind regards, Alice.
